title: Urgent help needed: Fake loan
selftext:
An idiot friend of mine downloaded an money lending app Verifile Ind https://apps.apple.com/in/app/verifile-ind-credit-loan-app/id6450492142

In the app description it said something like this
https://imgur.com/a/1VJUCzC
It said no hidden charges and specific rate of interest. 

But when the loan was dispersed it said almost 50% is processing fees. 

Cancellation option is not working and no other option of cancelling the loan. Support is nonexistent. 

The loan amount is dispersed into multiple amounts of Rs 5000 from different lenders and each processing fees is 50%.
https://imgur.com/a/MsGJkau

From doing a bit of research on the internet I can see it's a usual fake loan Chinese app. The app has access to contacts and for repayment they call their contacts and harass them. They have even threatened someone that they will morph their photos and send to his contacts.

Please help in advising in what way he can resolve this.

Yep it's possible. A lot of people ik used to Target these Chinese loan apps and never paid them back.

Block all their phone numbers. And ask ur friend to tell everyone on their contact list that their phone info has been hacked and that to ignore any calls from unknown nos.
Kuch nai ukhaad sakte hai saale wo log
